page.title: 14WHEN I'M ILL
page.content: WHEN I'M ILL ____________ If I am taken ill my mother calls for the doctor.The doctor has his surgery at Bethesda.There are three doctors who look after the people of our area. If the doctor thinks I need some pills my father will go and get them from the Chemist in the village.If I need to go to the hospital I then have to travel down to the Bangor,to YSBYTY GWYNEDD.This is a huge new hospital that was opened in 1984.The people from the whole of Gwynedd attend this hospital if they are very ill. The doctors surgery is open every weekday but on Saturday and Sunday there is a doctor on calkl ready to deal with emergencies only.
